text: Rafał Jerzy Sznajder (13 October 1972 - 13 April 2014) was a Polish fencer. He competed in three Summer Olympic Games (1996, 2000 and 2004). He won a bronze medal at both the 1997 and 2001 World Fencing Championships. He was born in Będzin. Sznajder died from a heart attack on 13 April 2014 in Plovdiv, Bulgaria. He was 41. ==References== ==Other websites== * Rafał Sznajder at Sports-Reference.com Category:1972 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Bulgaria Category:Polish fencers Category:Olympians for Poland
title: Rafał Sznajder
